parts.title: Content
parts.desc: The actual content of the element (text, images, etc.). The size of the content box can be controlled using properties like width and height.

parts.title: Padding
parts.desc: Space between the content and the border of the element. The padding is transparent and can be set using padding, padding-top, padding-right, padding-bottom, and padding-left. It can also be set in a shorthand format, like padding: 10px 20px;.

parts.title: Border
parts.desc: Surrounds the padding (if any) and the content. Borders can be styled using border-width, border-style, and border-color. You can also set all border properties in one line using the border shorthand, like border: 1px solid #000;.

parts.title: Margin
parts.desc: The space outside the border, essentially the space between elements. Margins are transparent, and can be adjusted using margin, margin-top, margin-right, margin-bottom, and margin-left. The shorthand margin: 10px 20px; can also be used.
